gold.user: User requests to fetch details of a specific queue using the Account SID and Queue SID.
gold.ideal: Returns the details of the specified queue in JSON format.

gold.user: User wants to update the properties of a specific queue identified by its SID.
gold.ideal: Updates the queue and returns the updated queue details in JSON format.

gold.user: User intends to delete a specific queue by providing its SID.
gold.ideal: Successfully deletes the queue and returns a confirmation message.

gold.user: User wants to retrieve a list of all queues associated with their account.
gold.ideal: Returns a list of queues in JSON format, including their SIDs and properties.

gold.user: User is looking to create a new queue with specified attributes.
gold.ideal: Creates the queue and returns the details of the newly created queue in JSON format.
